categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: The 22nd Air Combat Wing was a unit of the Grand Army of the Republic.
The 22nd fought at Deko Neimoidia, Boz Pity, and Murkhana. It included Ion Team, a clone commando unit, as a part of its clone forces.[source?]
When Order 66 was issued, members of the 22nd killed Master Saras Loorne and two Jedi Knights[source?], although Ion Team spared Bol Chatak, Olee Starstone, and Roan Shryne.
The name 22nd Air Combat Wing may be a reference to the 22nd Special Air Service Regiment (SAS), a famous British Special Forces unit.
